    • Constructor Detail

      • PrescriptionDose

        public PrescriptionDose(int amount,
                DoseUnit unit)
        Creates a newly initalized version of the presription dose. Adds a single dose to the list of doses.
        Parameters:
        amount - : the number of units to give. Example 81 in "81 mg"
        unit - : the unit of measure for the dose.
